Gaming is correct, as long as your child can handle the easy concept "Its just a game", but in fact, the game isnt the problem, its the community, by playing for example ranked games in this game swearing can easily happen but there is a solution to that, muting the other players, but if you mute them, you wont be able to receive any information from them, which is sad for a multiplayer-game. But your child may play with friends that can be respectful to avoid that community problem.
